configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - Virginia

scenarios.description: This is the May 5th run of the Pause-May8 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 8 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Pause-May8 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Pause-Jun10 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 8 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Pause-Jun10 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Slow-May8 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 8 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Slow-May8 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Slow-Jun10 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 8 days.
This is the May 5th run of the Slow-Jun10 model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
